original_text: Moses gave the redemption money to Aaron and his sons, as he was commanded by the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 모세가 이 속전을 여호와의 말씀대로 아론과 그의 아들들에게 주었으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하심과 같았느니라

sentences.original_text: Moses gave the redemption money to Aaron and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 속전을 아론과 그의 아들들에게 주었다

sentences.original_text: as he was commanded by the word of the Lord
